about:
Welcome to my page! My name is Mihika Jain, and I am a senior at Cornell University studying Computer Science with a minor in Business. I am incredibly passionate about software development and entrepreneurship. I want to use my skillset to be able to implement technology that pushes innovation and creates social impact. 

 I am interested in both back end and full stack development and thrive in collaborative environments. I find my greatest strengths in leadership, creativity, and resilience. Outside of computer science, I am passionate about music, snowboarding, sailing, and being outdoors!
